items.title: JAMB confirms 2025 UTME result release schedule
items.summary: The Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board reaffirmed the timeline for releasing 2025 UTME scores and advised candidates to monitor the e-Facility portal.

items.title: WAEC opens January 2025 e-PIN sales for SSCE candidates
items.summary: Prospective WAEC candidates can now purchase e-PINs via the official channels and should guard their tokens against fraud.

items.title: TCN schedules Lagos transmission maintenance
items.summary: Transmission Company of Nigeria announced a six-hour maintenance window affecting Lagos Island and Mainland bulk supply feeders.

items.title: Kaduna Electric restores supply after overnight outage
items.summary: Power supply has been restored to key feeders after emergency repairs on a failed transformer, Kaduna Electric confirmed.
